Description: Absolutely stunning FULLY FURNISHED 5 bedroom home available for 9/1. Everything is custom designed and surprises at every turn! As you enter the high ceilings and generous use of natural light welcome you with relaxation. To your left, an incredibly spacious eat-in kitchen opens into the living room, showcasing a formal dining area where oversized windows and French doors fill the room with light. The formal living room has a beautiful gas fireplace and 4K TV. On the 2nd floor you find 4 oversized bedrooms and 3 full baths, two en-suite. The incredible primary bathroom with a jacuzzi and walk-in shower will not disappoint. (Washer/Dryer conveniently located on the same floor.) Downstairs is a 2nd living room, TV, full bath, wet bar, 2nd W/D and a gym that can be used as an additional bedroom or office space. This home offers a flexible layout in an amazing location with easy access to public transpiration and much more. Blocks to Longwood Medical, BU, green line & restaurants.
